events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The issue reported involves a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah M. for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
My order number is 987654321. I have attached a clear photo of the incorrect item that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 24 hours.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I'm glad the refund will be processed soon.
Your refund has been successfully processed and you should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund has been completed and confirmed, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
